Translations.Text: aur jo shaqs rahmaan ki yaad se ghaflath kare, hum us par ek shaytaan muqarrar kar dete hai, wahi us ka saathi rehta hai
aur wo unhe raah se rokte hai, aur ye isi qayaal mein rehte hai ke ye hidaayath yaafta hai
yahaa tak ke jab wo hamaare paas aayega, kahega kaash mere aur tere darmiyaan mashriq aur maghrib ki doori hoti (tu) bada bura saathi hai
aur jab ke tum zaalim teher chuke to tumhe aaj hargiz tum sab ka azaab mein shareek hona koyi nafa na dega
kya pas tu behre ko suna sakta hai ya andhe ko raah dikha sakta hai aur ose jo khuli gumraahi mein ho
pas agar hum tujhe yahaa se le bhi jaaye to bhi hum un se badhla lene waale hai
ya jo kuch un se waada kiya hai wo tujhe dikha de, hum un par bhi khudrath rakhte hai
pas jo wahi aap ki taraf ki gayi hai ose mazbooth thaame rahe, beshak aap raahe raasth par hai
aur yaqinan ye (khud) aap ke liye aur aap ki khaum ke liye nasihath hai aur an-qareeb tum log puche jaoge
aur hamaare un nabiyo se pucho! jinhe hum ne aap se pehle bheja tha, ke kya hum ne sivaaye rahmaan ke aur maboodh muqarrar kiye thein jin ki ibaadath ki jaaye
